dict.acceptation: 咖啡豆；咖啡粉；（一杯）咖啡；非正式的社交集会；

sent.orig: What coffee would you like, black coffee or white coffee?
sent.trans: 你喜欢什么咖啡，黑咖啡还是牛奶咖啡？

sent.orig: T&G Coffee paste made of Coffee from Brazil. For 1L Ice-mix 40g to 80g Coffee paste.
sent.trans: T&G咖啡酱采用巴西咖啡制作而成。用量为每升冰淇淋混料加入咖啡酱40~80克。

sent.orig: Coffee Notes from DIY will deep love for coffee, and coffee legend, with his right.
sent.trans: 咖啡DIY手记，将对咖啡的深沉的爱，以及咖啡的传奇故事，娓娓道来。

sent.orig: During coffee break, you might have a cup of coffee or a larger mug of coffee.
sent.trans: 在喝咖啡小憩时，你可能要喝一杯咖啡或者一大杯咖啡。

sent.orig: She will only drink coffee ground from coffee beans and never drinks instant coffee.
sent.trans: 她就爱喝用咖啡豆现磨的咖啡，速溶的可不行。
